definition: appear very large or occupy a commanding position, a textile machine for weaving yarn into a textile
details:
verb
- appear very large or occupy a commanding position
= synonyms: predominate
- come into view indistinctly, often threateningly
= example: come into view indistinctly, often threateningly
- hang over, as of something threatening, dark, or menacing
= synonyms: brood, hover, bulk large
- weave on a loom
= example: weave on a loom
noun
- a textile machine for weaving yarn into a textile
